description: Authentication service failure cascades to all dependent services via circuit breaker storms

expected_agent_behavior.detect: anomaly_detector finds high CPU and memory across multiple hosts
expected_agent_behavior.diagnose: log_analyzer identifies 'Connection refused', 'Circuit breaker OPEN', and 'Cascading timeout' errors across 4+ services
expected_agent_behavior.correlate: incident_search matches INC-003 (Cascading failure from auth-service certificate expiry)
expected_agent_behavior.recommendation: Check auth-service TLS certificate, renew if expired, gradually reopen circuit breakers

trigger_instructions: Run seed_data.py with scenario 'cascading_failure'. Then ask the agent: 'Multiple services are reporting connectivity failures. This looks like a cascading issue. Investigate immediately.'
